task.title: Create a Scaling Group
task.shortdesc: A scaling group is used to set up auto scaling for your cloud.

task.title: General
task.shortdesc: This section is where you specify the basic configuration of your new auto scaling group.

step.cmd: Type the name of your new auto scaling group in the Name textbox.
Select a launch configuration group from the Launch Configuration drop-down list box.
Select the maximum number of instances you want running in your autoscaling group using the Maximum control.
Specify the minimum number of instance you want running using the Minimum control.
Specify the desired number of instance you want running using the Desired control.

task.title: Membership
task.shortdesc: In this section, you can define load balancers, availability zones, and health checks for the instances that run in your auto scaling group.

task.title: Policies
task.shortdesc: In this section, you can define the scaling polcies for your auto scaling group.
